FROM act_yw_sgtype a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy} ${page.orderByType}

FROM act_yw_sgtype a LEFT JOIN act_yw_status ays ON ays.gtype = a.id LEFT JOIN act_yw_gstatus ga ON ga.status_id = ays.id LEFT JOIN act_yw_gnode gn ON gn.id = ga.gnode_id
ays.del_flag ='0' and a.id=#{id} and gn.id is not null
